sentences.en: -- Quickening the development and utilization of shallow offshore waters , beaches and inland waters.
sentences.cn: -- 加快开发利用浅海 、 滩涂和内陆水面.

sentences.en: A gentle current carried them slowly offshore.
sentences.cn: 和缓的潮流慢慢地把他们带离了海岸.

sentences.en: Andrews had stashed money away in secret offshore bank accounts.
sentences.cn: 安德鲁斯已经将钱存到了秘密的海外银行账户中。

sentences.en: Gambell involved a grant of oil and gas leases covering tracts offshore of Alaska.
sentences.cn: 坎贝尔一案涉及到阿拉斯加近海岸的一片油气田的租借权问题.

sentences.en: His money is in an offshore island bank.
sentences.cn: 他的钱都存进了海外的一家银行.

sentences.en: Oil, tapped from offshore rigs, would be more accessible.
sentences.cn: 用海上钻台开采石油可能比较容易做到.

sentences.en: One day a larger ship anchored offshore.
sentences.cn: 一天，一艘更大的船泊在了近岸处。

sentences.en: The building can accommodate all of the offshore workers and protect them from hurricane damage.
sentences.cn: 这个建筑能容纳所有的海上工人并且保护他们不受飓风的伤害。

sentences.en: The fish stayed 50 yards offshore, well out of range.
sentences.cn: 这种鱼生活在离岸50码的地方，完全钓不到。

sentences.en: The island offers a wide range of offshore banking facilities.
sentences.cn: 这座岛上有很多离岸金融机构。

sentences.en: The searing wind shrieks behind him, and mounting offshore swells heave him along.
sentences.cn: 凛冽的风在他身后狂啸, 汹涌巨浪把他向前抛送.

sentences.en: There is a strong west-going tide, even one mile offshore.
sentences.cn: 甚至近海1英里处就有向西涌动的汹涌潮水。

sentences.en: They can be misidentified easily in the subsurface as fossil offshore bars.
sentences.cn: 它们在地下深处最易于与石化了的滨外沙洲混淆起来.

sentences.en: They piped oil into storage tanks from ships anchored offshore.
sentences.cn: 他们从近海处抛锚停泊的船只上以管道输送油于贮藏箱内.

sentences.en: Tidal channels, deltas, and washover fans are characteristically associated with offshore bars.
sentences.cn: 潮汐水道 、 三角洲和冲刷扇典型地与滨外砂洲伴生在一起.

sentences.en: When they hit the rocks, they were just 500 yards offshore.
sentences.cn: 他们触礁时离海岸仅有500码。
